<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/50709</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>50709</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_503</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_503</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Radicales</string>
            <string language="en">Roots</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wurzeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Racines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Raizes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρίζες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los radicales. Se estudia su relación con las potencias y las diferentes propiedades y operaciones que se pueden efectuar con ellos, incluida la racionalización de fracciones que contienen algún radical.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain roots. It studies the relation between roots and powers, the properties of roots and the operations that can be carried out with them, including the rationalisation of fractions with roots.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">raíces</string>
            <string language="en">roots</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">potencias</string>
            <string language="en">powers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">operaciones</string>
            <string language="en">operations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">racionalización</string>
            <string language="en">rationalisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">radicales</string>
            <string language="en">radicals</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Wurzeln zu erklären. Sie studiert die Relation 
zwischen Wurzeln und Energien, die Eigenschaften der Wurzeln und die 
Operationen, die mit ihnen durchgeführt werden können, 
einschließlich die Rationalisierung der Brüche mit Wurzeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer des racines. Elle étudie la relation 
entre les racines et les puissances, les propriétés des racines et 
les exécutions qui peuvent être effectuées avec elles, y compris la
rationalisation des fractions avec des racines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
raizes. Estuda a relação entre raizes e potências, as 
propriedades das raizes e as operações que podem ser realizadas com 
elas, including o rationalisation das frações com as raizes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare le radici. Studia il rapporto fra le radici e le 
potenzi, le proprietà delle radici ed i funzionamenti che possono 
essere effettuati con loro, compreso la razionalizzazione delle 
frazioni con le radici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει τις ρίζες. _ αυτός μελετώ ο σχέση μεταξύ 
ρίζα και δύναμη, ο ιδιότητα ρίζα και ο διαδικασία που μπορώ 
είμαι διενεργώ με αυτός, συμπεριλαμβανομένου ο αιτιολόγηση μέρος
με ρίζα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wurzeln</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Operationen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rationalisierung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radikale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">racines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">puissances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exécutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">radicali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
